attributes.action: Lower the retirement age back to 65 to give young people a chance
attributes.additional_details: By lowering retirement age to 65 at least the people at 65 have contributed to there benefits this allows the younger people who haven’t contributed to there benefits a chance of work
attributes.background: Lower retirement age to 65 to help young people on the careers ladder

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321269
